apihelp-moderation-summary: Performs moderation-related action like Approve or Reject.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-descript: If the current user made an edit which is currently awaiting moderation, retrieve the text of this revision.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-param-mo: Expected format, either wikitext or parsed HTML.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-param-ti: Title of the page. Cannot be used together with <var>$1pageid</var>.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-param-pa: Page ID of the page. Cannot be used together with <var>$1title</var>.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-param-se: Only retrieve the content of this section number.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-parsed-e: Get HTML of the pending edit by this user in the page Dog.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-section-: Get wikitext of section #2 (third section) of the pending edit by this user in the page Cat.
apihelp-query+moderationpreload-wikitext: Get wikitext of the pending edit by this user in the page Cat.
